abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.

custom_host.description: No devices have been discovered, please proceed to manual setup

confirm.description: Do you want to start set up?

data.sms_alert_when_armed: SMS alerts only when device is armed

data_description.notifications_protocol:
* **Local**: The panel has `10.10.10.250` IP address
* **Cloud**: Panel traffic to cloud could be diverted to
Home Assistant on network level, no traffic sent to cloud servers
* **Chained cloud**: Same as **Cloud**, but traffic is also sent to cloud servers
for mobile application to work

data.cloud_local_port: Port to listen for panel traffic on
Port to listen for panel traffic on
data.cloud_upstream_host: Host to send panel notifications to after processing
data.cloud_upstream_port: Port to send panel notifications to after processing
